item.title: Did the 2019 Colorado Rockies really lack pitching talent?
item.description: Hello does this work? ## ## ── Column specification ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────── ## cols( ## .default = col_double(), ## Tm = col_character() ## ) ## ℹ Use `spec()` for the full column specifications. MLBpitch %>% summarise( Wins = mean(W), Hits = mean(H), Runs = sum(ER), Innings = sum(IP), ERA = ((Runs / Innings) * 9) ) ## # A tibble: 1 x 5 ## Wins Hits Runs Innings ERA ## <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> ## 1 81.

item.title: Did the 2019 Rockies really lack pitching talent?
